original_text: Then once more you shall see the distinction between the righteous and the wicked, between one who serves God and one who does not serve him.
korean_text: 그 때에 너희가 돌아와서 의인과 악인을 분별하고 하나님을 섬기는 자와 섬기지 아니하는 자를 분별하리라

sentences.original_text: Then once more you shall see
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 너희는 다시 보게 될 것이다

sentences.original_text: the distinction between the righteous and the wicked,
and one who does not serve him.
